. With the beautiful glacier (Hintertuxer Gletscher) skiing is possible 365 days a year.

value: Use wheel chains when there is snow and ice!

Express rail station Jenbach/Tirol, Zillertal railway (train or bus) to Mayrhofen; There is a post bus  traffic-connection Mayrhofen - Hintertux.

value: content=: At the foot of the Hintertuxer Glacier, right in the heart of Tirol, in one of the most beautiful areas in Austria, awaits an unforgettable holiday in the Alpenhof.
content=The 4 star Sport Vital Hotel Central lies in the beautiful village of Tux Landerbach in Zillertal valley.
content=The 4 star Hotel Tirolerhof was totally refurbished in 2012 and lies directly at the local ski resorts of Eggalm and Rastkogel in the village of Tux-Lanersbach.
